common_issues.title: LTM Engine Not Enabling After Update
common_issues.description: Users report that the Long-Term Memory (LTM) engine is not enabling after updating to PiecesOS 11.0.0 and Desktop application 3.3.0. This is due to the downloaded local LLM overriding saved data. A patch (PiecesOS 11.0.1 and Desktop application 3.3.1) was released but some users still report issues.

related_issues.title: LTM doesn't work; the copilot model by defaults not saved
related_issues.text:
LTM doesn't work; the copilot model by defaults not saved
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

[https://disk.yandex.ru/i/Z_U0FzYA8NBrNg](url)
There is a video here that describes the problem
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation:

**Key Points Raised:**

* User @Iliya3ProX reports Long-Term Memory (LTM) engine is not enabled, despite previous attempts.
* User provides video and logs for further investigation.
* The issue is confirmed and attributed to downloaded local LLM overriding saved data.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* @mack-at-pieces identifies and fixes the issue in debug.
* Patch released in version 11.0.1 of PiecesOS and 3.3.1 of Desktop application.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* Initial fix implemented in the mentioned versions.
* User @Iliya3ProX reports LTM still not enabled and new issue with webpage opening after reboot.
* Additional user reports similar experience.

**Action Items:**

* Investigate why the fix is not working for some users and address the new issue with the webpage.
* Follow up with users to confirm resolution.

**Additional Notes:**

* Related issues: "Can't turn on Long-Term Memory Engine", "Can't turn on long term memory engine", "Claude is having an aneurysm"
* Helpful resources: Existing Issues, Documentation, YouTube Channel

recommendations: **Investigate LTM Engine Issues:** Prioritize resolving the persistent issues with the Long-Term Memory (LTM) engine not enabling after the update. Focus on why the patch (PiecesOS 11.0.1 and Desktop application 3.3.1) hasn't resolved the problem for all users.
**Improve Patch Testing:** Enhance the testing procedures for patches to ensure they effectively address reported issues before release.

**Gather More User Data:** Collect more detailed feedback from users experiencing the LTM issue, including their operating systems, Pieces OS versions, and specific error messages. This will help pinpoint the root cause.

**Update Documentation and Communication:**  Provide clear and updated documentation on the LTM engine, including troubleshooting steps for common issues. Communicate known issues and workarounds to users through release notes or support channels.
